keyframes_format.timecode_format_rules:
CRITICAL: Timecode format is strictly HH:MM:SS (hours:minutes:seconds). - HH = hours (00-23) - MM = minutes (00-59) - SS = seconds (00-59)
Examples: - 5 seconds into video → "00:00:05" - 1 minute 30 seconds → "00:01:30" - 2 minutes 42 seconds → "00:02:42" - 15 minutes 8 seconds → "00:15:08" - 1 hour 5 minutes 20 seconds → "01:05:20"
WRONG formats (DO NOT USE): - "00:05:00" for 5 seconds (this means 5 MINUTES!) - "01:30:00" for 1min 30sec (this means 1 HOUR 30 MINUTES!) - "5" or "1:30" (missing leading zeros)
